cases.name: Availly
cases.description: Availability you share, privacy you keep.
cases.longDescription: A lightweight calendar and availability management tool built to make scheduling seamless and intuitive.
features: Calendar view for scheduling at a glance

cases.name: ShiftEnd
cases.description: Revolutionary platform designed to transform industry workflows.
cases.longDescription: A SaaS tool designed for Belgian restaurants to digitally and legally replace the outdated dagontvangstenboek (daily sales log). Simple, affordable, and compliant.

cases.name: Project Alpha
cases.description: Mobile application for finance management for Belgian banks
cases.longDescription: This innovative platform combines cutting edge technology such as AI and machine learning to provide accurate insights and recommendations for Belgian users.
